message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I think you'd really love. I'm asking for $100 for it. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
Bob, I appreciate your interest!  $90 is a bit lower than what I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway at $95. Let's close this deal.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $95. Would you be willing to go down to $92?
